title: Bugsplat.dll is not designed to run on windows
body:
Immediately after i hit launch from the client.

don't tell me I have to reinstall then don't bother to respond at all. am not doing that for the nth time.

can someone upload a bugsplat.dll file from their directoy and give me download link and try that.

i tried hextech repair with all options and didn't do anything

tried in client repair. didn't do anything. still can't launch. why the fuck are all those "fixing" methods are implemented if they never fix anything.

replies.body: I'm having the same issue and reinstalling doesn't work. I have been experiencing some heavy drops on the fps for a couple of weeks and then today the game just won't start. Maybe it's related.

The patcher needs to scan game files and download its own updates.  Just grabbing a single file from somewhere would be both unsafe and ineffective.  Your error is a strange one, and I would have suggested a reinstall.  Since you've already tried that, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work on this individually with you.  The HRT should have also grabbed some logs too, attach that to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!
